statements: DELETE FROM customer_contacts WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM campaign_participants WHERE campaign_id = 10 AND customer_id = 5;
DELETE FROM emails WHERE email_id = 1001 AND customer_id = 10;
DELETE FROM campaign_results WHERE opened = true;
DELETE FROM campaign_results WHERE customer_id = 100 AND clicked = FALSE;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' AND customer_name LIKE '%Doe%';
